name: Get On Social
overview:
Businesses everywhere are using social mediaâ€™s impressive popularity to instantly spread the word about new offerings, limited-time specials and important updates. The marketing potential is mind-boggling: Facebook alone has 750 million users who spend more than 700 billion minutes per month on the site.

Get On Social allows businesses to tap into that exposureâ€“without wasting time logging on to all the different social networks and slogging their way through the different interfaces. Get On Social is an email-based social media service. The service offers daily updates to the business’ Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn pages. The service’s value lies in both its ability to save business owners time as well as empowering those owners who feel that the learning curve is too cumbersome.

Get On Social sends business owners an email every morning asking what they would like to promote that day. They simply reply with anything that they would like to publicize, and Get On Social instantaneously posts these messages to all of their social media profiles. The combination of raving testimonials, proven effectiveness, and affordable prices is quickly making Get On Social a strong competitor in this market.
